author: bitrefill
content: Douglas Tuman - The Case For Monero, MoneroTalk, and Monerotopia - Full Interviewhttps://youtu.be/ZZekMo4mCg4This is my interview with Douglas Tuman, a former congressional candidate, host of the MoneroTalk podcast, and a Monero & financial privacy advocate. We discuss Monero, why it is important, why privacy matters, RandomX and Monero mining, Monero adoption on the darkweb, and Monero as a backup plan to the coming cashless world of cbdcs, negative interest rates, expiring currency, public blockchain surveillance, regulatory capture of public blockchains, and total financial censorship and surveillance. -----------------------------------------------Follow Douglas on social media:Twitter: https://twitter.com/DouglasTumanMoneroTalk Twitter: https://twitter.com/MoneroTalkMonerotopia Twitter: https://twitter.com/monerotopiaMonerotopia Website: https://monerotopia.com/MoneroTalk Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/monerotalk-----------------------------------------------Bitrefill is the largest crypto store since 2014! ðŸš€ Check out our catalog with over 4000+ gift cards and mobile refills worldwide:https://www.bitrefill.com/buy/worldwide/Sign up for a Bitrefill account:https://www.bitrefill.com/signupDownload the App for iOS & Android:iOS - https://apps.apple.com/us/app/bitrefill/id1378102623Android - https://play.google.com/store/apps/detailâ€¦pp&hl=en_US&gl=US-----------------------------------------------Follow us on: Twitter: https://twitter.com/bitrefill Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bitrefill/Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bitrefill -----------------------------------------------#Bitcoin #Crypto #Cryptocurrency #LiveonCrypto #whatisyourmoon #Invest #Bitrefill #btc #altcoins #LightningNetwork #satoshi #Google #digitalnomads #cryptodonations #donatebitcoin #XMR #Monero #privacy #privacycoin
